summary: Implements the box-to-box transformation used in R-CNN models, adjusting a box's center and size based on predicted deltas (dx, dy, dw, dh) by applying exponential scaling to width/height and offsetting the center.
business_intent: Provides the core geometry operation for object detection pipelines to refine proposal bounding boxes and generate regression targets, improving localization accuracy in computerâ€‘vision systems.
